tool_description: This API will return random Chuck Norris jokes in several languages. The amount of languages supported will grow over time. At the moment only German is supported.
title: Chuck Norris Jokes

api_list.name: Get Random Joke
api_list.description: This will return a randomly selected Chuck Norris Joke in the queried language.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chuck-norris-jokes.p.rapidapi.com/{language}/jokes/random"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chuck-norris-jokes.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Information
api_list.description: This will return information on the API version and the currently supported languages.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chuck-norris-jokes.p.rapidapi.com/info"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chuck-norris-jokes.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
